item.title: Multi-Hop Locks for Secure, Privacy-Preserving and Interoperable Payment-Channel Networks
item.description: Giulio Malavolta (Friedrich-Alexander-University Erlangen-Nuernberg), Pedro Moreno-Sanchez (Purdue University), Clara Schneidewind (Vienna University of Technology), Aniket Kate (Purdue University) and Matteo Maffei (Vienna University of Technology) https://eprint.iacr.org/2018/472.pdf https://twitter.com/kanzure/status/1048476273259900928 This is joint work with my colleagues. I promise I will talk slower than the last talk. In a multi-hop network, the security tool is a hash-time lock contract (HTLC) where the payment is conditioned on revealing the pre-image of a hash function. This is pretty much the main setup for the lightning network today.
